title: Are Rhett and Link Traitors?
description:
Sam, Jeff, and Luke discuss their own spiritual deconstructions (or lack thereof) in light of Rhett and Link 'coming out' as Agnostics / Nones, and consider the instinct to see them as traitors.

Rhett and Link's Spiritual Journey:
1. (Early Years to Starting College) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hYCgz-MiNE4
2. (College to Starting Careers) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2_5PG-cl9WE
3. (Rhett's Deconstruction) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1qbna6t1bzw
4. (Link's Deconstruction) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w1AZhlyoD9s
5. (Further Reflections) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B9-kc-LGgp8
6. (Q&A) https://youtu.be/AgJjvVgdNB8

ACW (A Conversation With) Philip DeFrranco:
https://youtu.be/yCwqigzvhj8

Sam's discussion with Paul Vander Klay:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QuoqGzIu5Wc

Jeff's discussions with Paul Vander Klay:
1. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JoAHv6_LG_w
2. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vUJYX7dx5LA

Luke's discussions with Paul Vander Klay:
1. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DSiCZLHkZXA
2. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OJcfR6hWJHU

David Fuller and Andrea with the Bangs:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rgFpp8WzQCg

Rebel Wisdom: David Fuller and Dave Rubin:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I9mCNoJLnKQ

Rebel Wisdom: David Fuller and Paul Vander Klay:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o1OMqErdDGk

Chris Date and Phil Fernandes Hell Debate:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PaPz33dVPvc

To have conversations like these and connect with others who want to as well, join the Bridges of Meaning Discord server: https://discord.gg/zDaQ3q
